featured.text: The dead material and waste matter form the diet of a group of living organisms called decomposers.
Lastly, treat relationship as an organism.

definition.zh_def: 生物體，指任何活的生物，包括動物、植物、真菌和微生物。
definition.en_def: An organism is any living entity, including animals, plants, fungi, and microorganisms.
definition.example: A tree is a large organism that provides oxygen and habitat for many species.
